functions.name: set
functions.description: Modifies global or granular overrides to enable or disable a target

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Determines whether we enable or disable it

parameters.name: isGranular
parameters.description: Determines whether we modify global or granular overrides

functions.name: setAll
functions.description: Modifies overrides to enable or disable all of the targets

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Determines whether we enable or disable

parameters.name: isGranular
parameters.description: Determines whether we modify global or granular overrides

functions.name: remove
functions.description: Removes a target from the overrides. Unlike set, this function will not add -Target to overrides

parameters.name: isGranular
parameters.description: Determines whether we modify global or granular overrides

parameters.name: isGranular
parameters.description: Determines whether we modify global or granular overrides

functions.name: resetToDefaults
functions.description: Modifies overrides to only enable defaults

parameters.name: isGranular
parameters.description: Determines whether we modify global or granular overrides

functions.name: invalids
functions.description: Validates the global overrides and returns unknown targets

functions.name: available
functions.description: Returns a list of available targets

functions.name: defaults
functions.description: Returns a list of default targets
